Message:
We all came to play
at the lake today.

Me and Cerberus played
underwater tag,
a bunch of us played
shark attack with Moddey
and chased her around...

Then after that,
a little bit of trouble happened...
Still, I had so much fun!

But, as we were
coming back from the lake...
there was even bigger trouble.

It happened right when
everyone was changing clothes.
I was done, but everyone looked
like they needed more time...

Huh? Master?
Why are you waving me
to come over there?
